data_extracted: UG compensation: Base up to $96,200, Bonus up to $9,620, Signing $10,000
MBA compensation: Base $147,500, Bonus up to $8,112
Position keywords: Analyst, Sr. Analyst, Consultant, Sr. Consultant, Manager, Sr. Manager
Canadian office locations: Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto Area, Calgary
Service capabilities: business strategy, data and AI, talent, process, experience
Industry expertise across all major sectors
2026 recognition as Gartner Magic Quadrant Leader
Chicago headquarters: 500 W. Madison St., 6,800 employees
Major presence in: Austin (2), San Antonio (2), Dallas, Houston

id.rationale: Simple kebab-case form of company name, matching firms-to-research.json

name.rationale: Using 'Accenture Strategy' to distinguish the strategy consulting practice from broader Accenture operations, as this is the practice most relevant to MBB-style recruiting

type.rationale: While Accenture overall is enormous, it's not MBB or Big 4. The strategy arm competes with other non-MBB strategy firms like Oliver Wyman and Kearney

tagline.value: Global IT/digital consulting giant with dedicated strategy practice—massive scale, deep tech integration
tagline.rationale: Emphasizes Accenture's unique positioning: strategy consulting backed by unparalleled technology and implementation capabilities

headquarters.rationale: Accenture's legal headquarters is in Dublin (since 2009). US operations are centered in Chicago, but Dublin is the global HQ

founded.rationale: Founded as Andersen Consulting in 1989, though it became 'Accenture' in 2001

employees.rationale: Using fiscal 2025 figure of ~779,000 employees globally from web search (more recent than Management Consulted's 721,000)

parent_company.rationale: Accenture is an independent publicly traded company (NYSE: ACN)

offices.rationale: Accenture has 50+ US locations. Listed major metro areas where consulting hiring is most active, confirmed from web search showing Texas presence (Austin, San Antonio, Dallas, Houston) and Chicago as major hub

regions.rationale: Accenture operates in 120 countries globally with presence across all major regions

specialties.rationale: Accenture Strategy focuses on strategic consulting but is deeply integrated with technology, digital transformation, data/analytics, and operational capabilities

industries.rationale: Accenture serves 40+ industries. Listed the major sectors where strategy consulting is most active

known_for.value: One of the world's largest consulting firms with 779,000 employees globally. Accenture Strategy is the pure strategy arm within a massive technology and digital consulting organization, offering deep tech capabilities and implementation firepower that pure strategy firms cannot match.
known_for.rationale: Emphasizes Accenture's scale advantage and unique tech-strategy integration that differentiates it from pure-play strategy boutiques

hires_ug.rationale: Accenture has active undergraduate recruiting programs with Analyst roles

hires_mba.rationale: Accenture recruits MBAs for Consultant and higher-level roles

career_path.value: Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Manager (2-3 yrs) → Senior Manager (3-4 yrs) → Managing Director
career_path.rationale: Typical progression based on Management Consulted position keywords and standard consulting firm structures

travel.rationale: Accenture consultants travel 2-4 days per week depending on project, somewhat less than MBB's 4-5 days typical travel

work_hours.rationale: Consulting work is demanding (50-60 hrs/week) but generally less intense than MBB's 60+ hour weeks

base.rationale: Management Consulted lists 'up to $96,200' as base for undergrad/Master's

bonus.rationale: Management Consulted lists 'up to $9,620' performance bonus, rounded to $9,600

base.rationale: Management Consulted lists $147,500 MBA base salary

bonus.rationale: Management Consulted lists 'up to $8,112' performance bonus, rounded to $8,100

signing.rationale: No MBA signing bonus information found in sources

process.value: Application → Online Assessment → First Round (2 case + 1 fit/behavioral) → Final Round (2 case + 1 fit/behavioral)
process.rationale: Standard Accenture process includes online assessment and multiple rounds of case/fit interviews

unique.value: Focus on tech-enabled business strategy. Cases often involve digital transformation, data analytics, and technology implementation considerations beyond pure strategy.
unique.rationale: Accenture Strategy cases integrate technology and implementation perspectives that differentiate them from pure strategy firm cases

timeline.value: Rolling recruiting year-round, with peak hiring in fall for summer internships and full-time roles
timeline.rationale: Accenture operates on rolling basis unlike structured MBB recruiting cycles

email_format.rationale: Confirmed from Management Consulted firm profile page

careers.rationale: Direct link to job search page visited during research

mc_profile.rationale: Management Consulted profile page used for primary research

linkedin_alumni.rationale: Standard BYU alumni search URL format with 'accenture' keyword

pipeline.rationale: Accenture does not actively recruit at BYU on-campus, but has 587 BYU alumni who can potentially provide networking connections

alumni_all_time.rationale: LinkedIn search showed 587 BYU alumni who have ever worked at Accenture

alumni_current.rationale: Could not determine current employee count from LinkedIn Alumni page filtering

tip.rationale: No BYU-specific recruiting insights available from research

data_gaps.reason: MBA signing bonus not listed in Management Consulted data
LinkedIn Alumni page did not display 'Where they work' current employee counts in the filtered view
No BYU-specific recruiting intelligence found in sources
Management Consulted only listed Canadian offices. Web search confirmed 50+ US locations but did not provide complete city list. Used major metro areas where consulting recruiting is most active.

notes: Accenture is unique as a 'Boutique' classification because while the overall company is enormous (779K employees), the Strategy practice operates more like a boutique within the larger organization
The firm's headquarters location is complex: legally Dublin, Ireland, but US operations centered in Chicago. Used Dublin as official HQ per schema guidance to use where global leadership sits.
Compensation data from Management Consulted may be slightly dated. The figures represent 'up to' amounts which likely reflect top performance.
The 'Accenture Strategy' name distinguishes this practice from the broader Accenture organization which includes technology, digital, and operations consulting beyond pure strategy work
Accenture's scale (779K employees) is 40x larger than MBB firms, making it fundamentally different in organizational structure and culture despite competing for similar strategy work
